pkgmetadata.longdescription: # OGCogc - provisioning, that's it.# Get started- [Getting Started Guide](https://adam-stokes.github.io/ogc/)- User Guide - [Managing Deployment](https://adam-stokes.github.io/ogc/user-guide/managing-nodes/) - [Defining Layouts](https://adam-stokes.github.io/ogc/user-guide/defining-layouts/) - [Scripting](https://adam-stokes.github.io/ogc/user-guide/scripting/)# LicenseMIT.
